GoDirect Trade ensures all listings have an image, quality document, and of course, price. Every listing is the real deal! Why is that important?
- Accurate and informative listings give buyers the confidence they need to complete the order online with limited or no seller intervention
- When every product listing is immediately available, buyers will return to the marketplace for their urgent needs
- Buyers have a zero tolerance for risk. When they actually receive the product as described, they’ll start making more of their purchases online from sellers that make it easy for them
